info.title: Freelance Marketplace API
info.description: A production-ready backend for a freelance marketplace

get.description: Get all orders created by the current client
Get available (non-occupied) specializations for an order
Get all applications for a specific specialization within an order
Check if the current freelancer can apply for an order or specific specialization
Get admin notifications including pending freelancers, orders, and help requests
Get a summary of pending notifications and orders for admin dashboard
Get help request notifications with optional status filter

put.description: Update a help request notification (mark as read/resolved, add admin notes)

post.description: Mark a help request notification as read
Mark a help request notification as resolved with optional admin notes
Universal endpoint for requesting admin help with any context

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Optional reason for the help request

phone_number.title: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Phone number in E.164 format. Example: +1234567890

phone_number.title: Phone Number
phone_number.description: Phone number in E.164 format. Must match OTP destination.

firebase_token.title: Firebase Token
firebase_token.description: Optional Firebase ID token. Used only on /auth/verify-otp for alternative verification path. Not used by /auth/request-otp.
